name: Machete
description: Used to open noxious pods.<c=@flavor>Pods can contain armor, weapons, and recipes.</c>

name: Legendary Inscription
description: Used in the crafting of weapons with the potential to become Legend.

name: Dust Cloud
description: Found on dust mites.

name: Empty Keg
description: An empty keg made by cooks for storing liquids.

name: Chak Cache
description:
Double-click to open.
Contains loot from creatures.
<c=@reminder>Affected by magic-find bonuses.</c>

name: Crystal Arbiter Glider
description: This will unlock the glider skin in your account wardrobe.

name: Recipe: Verata's Metal Breather
description: A recipe to make an ascended heavy breather with Sinister (+Condition Damage, +Power, and +Precision) stats.

name: Ancient Overcharged Quartz
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Guide: Mistward Pauldrons

description: Found on steam creatures.

name: Veteran Saurian Cache
description: Double-click to gain obsidian shards, ley-line crystals, and other gear.

name: Branded Crystalline Phial
description: Double-click to combine the five corrupted crystalline phials into the Case of Corrupted Crystalline Phials.

name: Essence of the West
description: Combine with Essence of Lion's Arch, Essence of the East, and Mystic Coins in the Mystic Forge to create a Lion's Arch Portal Scroll.

name: Thief's Cache
description: Rewarded for map completion on a Magus Falls map with a thief.

name: Recipe: Wanderer's Pearl Blunderbuss

name: Printed Schematic
description: The purpose of this note is cryptic, containing esoteric formulae and diagrams. The machine-printed numbers and letters are unremarkable, but there are three numbers underlined by hand: 0, 1, and 1.
Consume to unlock this Mist Champion for your account.

The backpack of a Vigil leader.
<c=@flavor>"You may win the battle, dragon, but you will never defeat our spirit!"</c> 
—Warmaster Forgal Kernsson, Vigil
